p: It is suggested that the regulators may consider examining and recognizing all the healthcare workforce related challenges and organizational and regulatory voids, and thereafter reinforce core capacities in workforce and monetary resources, surveillance, laboratory services and, especially, hospital preparedness for isolation and ventilation of patients. In this regard, the Pakistani National Institute of Health needs to play a more vigilant role not only in implementing protocols regarding COVID‚Äê19 prevention, transmission and detection, but also in training of healthcare professionals.
